text: Akademgorodok (meaning: "academic campus" or "academic town") is a name of districts in several cities in former USSR (now in Russia and Ukraine): * Akademgorodok in Novosibirsk - probably the largest one * Akademgorodok (Tomsk), in Tomsk, Russia * Akademgorodok (Krasnoyarsk), in Krasnoyarsk, Russia * Akademgorodok, also known as Akademmistechko (Kiev) in Kiev, Ukraine
title: Akademgorodok (disambiguation)
